Text: Leaving aside what Israel may or may not be doing against the Palestinians, are you saying that what happened during WWII is just a fabrication?

There is no way they could be doing these things to the Palestinians if it had happened. Their entire sales pitch on making it into a secular religion is so that it never happens again. It is not happening again. This is the first time. QED

That said, one would think after nearly a decade of CSI type shows and their huge popularity people would have learned to evaluate evidence not what people say about evidence.

israeli-scum Palestinian punk you mother is the offspring of a monkey and a pig, your Prophet was a sodomite and a liar. Your sisters are whores and their fathers are their pimps.
